description: Removes the specified policy from the specified certificate. Note: This action is deprecated and works as expected for backward compatibility, but we won't add enhancements. Use  DetachPolicy instead. Requires permission to access the DetachPrincipalPolicy action.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy to detach.

parameters.name: principal
parameters.description: The principal. Valid principals are CertificateArn (arn:aws:iot:region:accountId:cert/certificateId), thingGroupArn (arn:aws:iot:region:accountId:thinggroup/groupName) and CognitoId (region:id).
